title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 894.2 - Final report of advisory committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 894.2 - Final report of advisory committee

State Regulations
(a) The advisory
committee shall submit a final written report to the municipality within 90
days of its designation containing: (1)
a
description of the characteristics of the cable system deemed best suited to
the needs and interests of the municipality; and
(2)
a "Request for Proposals", in compliance
with section
894.3
of this

Part. (b) The advisory
committee shall submit a copy of its final report to the commission upon
submitting it to the municipality. Upon receipt of the final report of the
advisory committee, the municipality shall: (1)
make a copy of the report available for
public inspection during normal business hours; and
(2)
consider the findings and recommendations
contained in the report and, at a public session, within 45 days of the receipt
of such final report, adopt a formal request for proposals that conforms to the
requirements of section
894.3
of this Part. The request
for proposals submitted by the advisory committee as part of its final report
is not binding on the municipality and may be modified in whole or in
part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
894.2

Adopted, New

York State Register March 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 11, eff. 2/26/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
